quote: I have a speaking coach. All we do is talk to people.
why_clipworthy: It highlights the importance of communication skills in real estate.
suggested_hook: Why every REALTOR should consider a speaking coach.

quote: To be great, you've got to be consistent.
why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the critical role of consistency in success.
suggested_hook: The secret to success in real estate? Consistency.
